title: Legacy client opens but does nothing when clicking launch
body: Alright so I'm currently having this problem where if i remove and reinstall league the legacy client says it is updating when patching then launch button appears. Then i go to click the launch button and nothing happen there are no applications of league running in tasks the client just disappears waited 4 hours nothing happens.{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: It sounds like you might still be on the legacy client, and the culprit here sounds like a security setting blocking access.  No fear, just go through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access to your game files are being allowed.  That should get you squared away!
